header_3_font_size=”18px” header_3_letter_spacing=”2px” header_3_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”||21px|||” text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” link_font_size_tablet=”12px” link_font_size_phone=”” link_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”28px” header_2_font_size_phone=”28px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”20px” header_3_font_size_phone=”18px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off”]

we care every month

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text module_class=”team-block” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Karla||||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.76)” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.6em” link_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” link_text_color=”#0582ca” header_2_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#003554″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_3_font=”Montserrat|||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#0582ca” custom_margin=”||29px||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” link_font_size_tablet=”12px” link_font_size_phone=”” link_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”28px” header_2_font_size_phone=”26px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”20px” header_3_font_size_phone=”18px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off”]

We believe that there has to be more to our agency then just delivering social media results, and that more is Socialistics Cares. Every month we highlight one of our team or client’s favorite cause or charity through a blog post, monthly social media posts, and a monetary donation. Our core values of Trust, Freedom, Innovation, Kindness and Generosity demand we do more, and we couldn’t be more thrilled that we are in a position to make a small difference in any way that we can. Have a cause or charity that you care about that you want us to highlight? Feel free to reach out and spread the love and we’ll consider featuring them!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.5″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_font=”Montserrat|800|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_text_color=”#003554″ header_2_font_size=”40px”]

OUR RECENT SOCIALISTICS CARES CAMPAIGNS 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blog fullwidth=”off” posts_number=”1″ include_categories=”27″ show_more=”on” show_author=”off” show_categories=”off” show_pagination=”off” admin_label=”Blog” module_class=”cnewblog” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#003554″ body_font=”Karla||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” meta_font=”Karla||||||||” meta_text_color=”#000000″ read_more_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” read_more_font_size=”16px” read_more_letter_spacing=”1px” pagination_text_color=”#003554″ custom_css_main_element=”-webkit-box-shadow: 0px 40px 80px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.22);|| box-shadow: 0px 40px 80px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.22);|| border-radius: 5px;” border_width_all=”0px”][/et_pb_blog][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_blog posts_number=”2″ include_categories=”27″ excerpt_length=”150″ show_more=”on” show_author=”off” show_categories=”off” show_pagination=”off” offset_number=”1″ admin_label=”Blog” module_class=”cnewblogextra” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”Montserrat|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#003554″ body_font=”Karla||||||||” body_line_height=”1.8em” meta_font=”Karla||||||||” meta_text_color=”#000000″ read_more_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” read_more_font_size=”16px” read_more_letter_spacing=”1px” pagination_text_color=”#003554″][/et_pb_blog][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
